forum.content:
Tied to a sallow heart
Why does he want to bring me where he goes
Oh and to find out the reasons why
It's enough to make you wanna try
For one last night

跟一顆虛弱的心互相牽絆
為什麼他總是一定要我隨著他
只要想找出背後的動機
已經足夠我停留

最後一晚

Ghosts and silhouettes
They take a piece of me they want it all
Oh but to wait in an empty room
With the feeling that is closing in.

幽靈與黑影們
他們想要我 想要把我吞沒

一個人在空盪的房間裡
伴隨著不停被壓迫的不適


[Chorus]
I had a dream I was dying
But I found nobody there
And if one last night is all that we've been given
Lets live it like we care

For one last night
For one last night

我做了一個夢
夢見我要死了
但是沒有人可以幫我
如果我們都只剩下最後一晚
那就活得像樣點吧

為了最後一晚
這最後一晚

Broken upon the rocks
Let the beating waves
Come drag me down
Oh but to find out the reasons why
It's enough to make you wanna try
For one last night

海邊石頭上的裂縫
讓潮水不斷侵蝕
最後帶走我

如果想找出答案
就留下來試試看吧
當作最後一次

urls.description: Uma Versão Legendada, editada por min Galera!!.. Espero que tenha ficado show!!!
urls.title: One Last Night Vaults (Fifty Shades of Grey Soundtrack) Video Fan Legendado

forum.title: One Last Night
